    Adrax coiled his long, spike filled body through the air. His eight eyes 
gleamed in the sunlight as they finally made it to some sort of civilization. 
He looked closer to see that they had reached Predacon territory, but they 
just stumbled apon a protohuman hunting party.
    "Ah, a feast, or at least it would be if I wasnt trapped in this 
miniscule form! None-the-less, a feast i shall make of them!" He said, 
plunging down on them from the sky.
    Many of the humans thrust spears at him, even basic arrows, and clubs. 
They did little damage and as he got closer many of them scattered. Adrax 
snapped his jaw quickly around one large alpha male, as it would seem because 
he was the biggest and seemed to be leading them.
    In his Predacon shell, Adrax could swallow the human whole as he was able 
to in his past life. Now, like a snake, he choked his pery until the human 
turned a chill pale. With his insect like arks, he ripped the meal into 
smaller parts and gobbled them quickly. The process was much longer than 
expected, and when he went to find another human, they were gone.
    Adrax, spinning the the air, blood staining his mouth full of jagged 
teeth, "Hairless apes! You cant run forever!"
    With that, he turned to his counterpart and then looked in the direction 
of the base which wasnt to far off now. He took to the air once more and 
proceeded on to the destination.
